column2: a'lamih jhani hqwq bshr
az anja kh shnasayei hithit thati klih' a'dai khanwadh bshri w hqwq iksan w antqal napthir anan asas azadi w 'dalt w slh ra dr jhan tshkil midhd,

az anja kh 'dm shnasayei w thqir hqwq bshr mnjr bh a'mal whshianhii grdidh ast kh rwh bshrit ra bh 'sian wadashth w zhwr dniaii kh dr an afrad bshr dr bian w 'qidh azad w az trs w fqr fargh bashnd b'nwan balatrin amal bshr a'lam shdh ast,
az anja kh asasan hqwq ansani ra baid ba ajrai qanwn hmait krd ta bshr bh 'nwan akhrin 'laj bh qiam br dd zlm w fshar mjbwr ngrdd,
az anja kh asasan lazm ast tws'h rwabt dwstanh bin mll ra mwrd tshwiq qrar dad,

az anja kh mrdm mll mthd bawr khwd ra bhqwq asasi bshr w mqam w arzsh frd ansani w tsawi hqwq mrd w zn mjddan dr mnshwr a'lam krdhand w tsmim raskh grfthand kh bh pishrft ajtma'i kmk knnd w dr mhit azad wd' zndgi bhtri bwjwd awrnd,
az anja kh dwl 'dw mt'hd shdhand kh ahtram jhani w r'ait waq'i hqwq bshr w azadihai asasi ra ba hmkari sazman mll mthd ta'min knnd,
az anja kh hsn tfahm mshtrk nsbt bh in hqwq w azadiha brai ajrai kaml in t'hd kmal ahmit ra dard,

mjm' 'mwmi, in a'lamih jhani hqwq bshr ra arman mshtrki brai tmam mrdm w klih mll a'lam miknd ta jmi' afrad w hmh arkan ajtma' in a'lamih ra piwsth md nzr dashth bashnd w tlash knnd kh bwsilh' t'lim w trbit ahtram in hqwq w azadiha gstrsh iabd w ba tdabir tdriji mli w binalmlli, shnasaii w ajrai waq'i w hiati anha tchh dr mian khwd mll 'dw w tchh dr bin mrdm kshwrhayei kh dr qlmrw anha mibashnd, ta'min grdd.
madh awl:
tmam afrad bshr azad bh dnia miaind w az lhaz hithit w hqwq ba hm brabrnd. hmh darai 'ql w wjdan hstnd w baid nsbt bh ikdigr ba rwh bradri rftar knnd.
madh dwm:

1 - hr ks mitwand bdwn hitchgwnh tmaiz mkhswsan az hith njad, rng, jns, zban, mthhb, 'qidh siasi ia hr 'qidh' digr w hmtchnin mlit, wd' ajtma'i, thrwt, wladt ia hr mwq'it digr, az tmam hqwq w klih' azadihaii kh dr a'lamih hadr thkr shdh ast, bhrhmnd grdd.

2 - b'lawh hitch tb'idi b'ml nkhwahd amd kh mbtni br wd' siasi, adari w qdayei ia binalmlli kshwr ia srzmini bashd kh shkhs bh an t'lq dard, khwah in kshwr mstql, tht qiwmit ia ghir khwdmkhtar bwdh ia hakmit an bh shkli mhdwd shdh bashd.
madh swm:
hr ks hq zndgi, azadi w amnit shkhsi dard.
madh tchharm:
hitchksi ra nmitwan dr brdgi ngh dasht w dadwstd brdgan bh hr shkli kh bashd, mmnw' ast.
madh pnjm:
hitchksi ra nmitwan zir shknjh, mjazat ia rftari qrar dad kh zalmanh, br khlaf ansanit w shyewn bshri ia ahantamiz bashd.
madh shshm:
hr ks hq dard kh shkhsit hqwqi aw dr hmhja b'nwan ik ansan dr mqabl qanwn shnakhth shwd.
madh hftm:

hmh dr brabr qanwn msawi astnd w hq darnd bdwn tb'id w msawianh az hmait qanwn brkhwrdar shwnd. hmh hq darnd dr mqabl hr tb'idi kh naqd a'lamih hadr bashd w dr brabr hr thriki kh brai tchnin tb'idi bh 'ml aid, bh gwnh msawi az hmait qanwn bhrhmnd shwnd.
madh hshtm:
dr brabr a'mali kh hqwq asasi hr frd ra mwrd tjawz qrar dhd w an hqwq bh wsilh qanwn asasi ia qanwn digri brai aw shnakhth shdh bashd, hr ks hq rjw' mwthr bh mhakm mli salhh dard.
madh nhm:
hitchksi nbaid khwdsranh twqif, hbs ia tb'id bshwd.
madh dhm:

hr ks ba msawat kaml hq dard kh d'waish bh wsilh dadgah mstql w bitrf, mnsfanh w 'lnan rsidgi shwd w tchnin dadgahi drbarh hqwq w alzamat aw ia hr atham jzaii kh bh aw twjh pida krdh bashd, tsmim bgird.
madh iazdhm:
hr ks kh bh jrmi mthm shdh bashd, bignah shmrdh khwahd shd, ta wqtikh dr jrian ik d'wai 'mwmi kh dr an klih tdminhai lazm brai dfa' aw ta'min shdh bashd, tqsir aw qanwnan mhrz grdd.

hitchks brai anjam ia 'dm anjam 'mli kh dr mwq' artkab an 'ml bh mwjb hqwq mli ia binalmlli jrm shnakhth nshwd, mhkwm nkhwahd shd. bh hmin triq hitch mjazati shdidtr az antchh kh dr mwq' artkab jrm bh an t'lq migrft drbarh ksi a'mal nkhwahd shd.
madh dwazdhm:

hitchksi dr zndgi khswsi, amwr khanwadgi, aqamtgah w ia mkatbat khwd nbaid mwrd mdakhlhhai khwdsranh waq' shwd w shraft w asm w rsmsh nbaid mwrd hmlh qrar gird. hr ks hq dard kh dr brabr ingwnh mdakhlat w hmlat mwrd hmait qanwn qrar gird.
madh sizdhm:
hr ks hq dard kh dr dakhl hr kshwri azadanh 'bwr w mrwr knd w mhl aqamt khwd ra antkhab nmaid.
hr ks hq dard hr kshwri w az jmlh kshwr khwd ra trk knd w ia bh kshwr khwd baz grdd.
madh tchhardhm:
hr ks hq dard dr brabr t'qib, shknjh w azar pnahgahi jstjw knd w dr kshwrhai digr pnah akhtiar nmaid.
dr mwrdi kh t'qib waq'an mbtni br jrm 'mwmi w ghirsiasi ia rftarhayei mkhalf ba aswl w mqasd mll mthd bashd, nmitwan az in hq astfadh nmwd.
madh panzdhm:
hr ks hq dard kh darai tab'it bashd.
hitchksi ra nmitwan khwdsranh az tab'it khwd ia az hq tghiir tab'it mhrwm krd.
madh shanzdhm:

hr zn w mrd balghi hq darnd bdwn hitchgwnh mhdwdit az nzr njad, mlit, tab'it ia mthhb ba hmdigr azdwaj knnd w tshkil khanwadh dhnd. dr tmam mdt znashwii w hngam anhlal an, zn w shwhr dr klih amwr mrbwt bh azdwaj, darai hqwq msawi astnd.
azdwaj baid ba rdait kaml w azadanh' zn w mrd waq' shwd.
khanwadh rkn tbi'i w asasi ajtma'i ast w hq dard az hmait jam'h w dwlt bhrhmnd shwd.
madh hfdhm:
hr shkhs mnfrdan ia btwr ajtma'i hq malkit dard.
hitchks ra nmitwan az hq malkit mhdwd nmwd.
madh hjdhm:

hr ks hq dard kh az azadi fkr, wjdan w mthhb bhrhmnd shwd. in hq mtdmn azadi tghiir mthhb ia 'qidh w hmtchnin mtdmn azadi azhar 'qidh w iman ast w niz shaml t'limat mthhbi w ajrai mrasm dini mibashd. hr ks mitwand az in hqwq tnha ia hmgani ba digran, bh twr khswsi ia btwr 'mwmi brkhwrdar bashd.
madh nwzdhm:

hr ks hq azadi 'qidh w bian dard w hq mzbwr shaml anst kh az dashtn 'qaid khwd bim w adtrabi ndashth bashd w dr ksb atla'at w afkar w dr akhth w antshar an bh tmam wsail mmkn w bdwn mlahzat mrzi azad bashd.
madh bistm:
hr ks hq dard azadanh mjam' w jm'ithai msalmtamiz tshkil dhd.
hitchks ra nmitwan mjbwr bh shrkt dr ajtma' krd.
madh bist w ikm:
hr ks hq dard dr adarh' amwr 'mwmi kshwr khwd, khwah mstqiman w ia khwah bh wsatt nmaindhgani kh azadanh antkhab shdh bashnd shrkt jwid.
hr ks hq dard ba tsawi shrait, bh mshaghl 'mwmi kshwr khwd nail aid.

asas w mnsha qdrt hkwmt, aradh' mrdm ast, in aradh baid bwsilh antkhabati abraz grdd kh az rwi sdaqt w btwr adwari swrt pthird. antkhabat baid 'mwmi w ba r'ait msawat bashd w ba ra'i pnhani ia triqh hmannd an anjam gird kh azadi ra'i ra ta'min nmaid.
madh bist w dwm:

hr ks bh 'nwan 'dw ajtma' hq amnit ajtma'i dard w mjaz ast bh wsilh msa'i mli w hmkari binalmlli hqwq aqtsadi, ajtma'i w frhngi ra kh lazmh' mqam w nmwd azadanh shkhsit aw ast ba r'ait tshkilat w mnab' hr kshwr bh dst awrd.
madh bist w swm:
hr ks hq dard kar knd, kar khwd ra azadanh antkhab nmaid, shrait mnsfanh w rdait bkhshi brai kar khwastar bashd w dr brabr bikari mwrd hmait qrar gird.
hmh hq darnd kh bdwn hitch tb'idi dr mqabl kar msawi, ajrt msawi driaft darnd.
hr ks kh kar miknd msthq mzd mnsfanh w rdait bkhshi mishwd kh zndgi aw w khanwadhash ra mwafq shyewn ansani ta'min knd w an ra dr swrt lzwm ba hr nw' wsail digr hmait ajtma'i tkmil nmaid.
hr ks hq dard kh brai dfa' az mnaf' khwd ba digran athadih tshkil dhd w dr athadihha niz shrkt knd.
madh bist w tchharm:
hr ks hq astraht, fraght w tfrih dard w bh khsws bh mhdwdit m'qwl sa'at kar w mrkhsihai adwari msthq akhth hqwq ast.
madh bist w pnjm:

hr ks hq dard kh sth zndgani, slamti w rfah khwd w khanwadhash ra az hith khwrak w mskn w mraqbthai tbi w khdmat lazm ajtma'i ta'min knd w hmtchnin hq dard kh dr mwaq' bikari, bimari, nqs a'da', biwh shdn, piri w ia dr tmam mward digri kh bh 'll kharj az ardh' ansan wsayel  amrar m'ash az dst rfth bashd az shrait abrwmndanh zndgi brkhwrdar shwd.
madran w kwdkan hq darnd kh az kmk w mraqbt mkhswsi bhrhmnd shwnd. kwdkan (tchh br athr azdwaj w tchh bdwn azdwaj bdnia amdh bashnd) hq darnd kh hmh az ik nw' hmait ajtma'i brkhwrdar shwnd.
madh bist w shshm:

hr ks hq dard kh az amwzsh w prwrsh bhrhmnd shwd. amwzsh w prwrsh laaql ta hdwdi kh mrbwt bt'limat abtdaii w asasi ast baid mjani bashd. amwzsh abtdaii ajbari ast. amwzsh hrfhii baid dr shrait tsawi kaml bh rwi hmh baz bashd, ta hmh bna bh ast'dad khwd btwannd az an bhrhmnd grdnd.

amwzsh w prwrsh baid twri hdait shwd kh shkhsit ansani hr ks ra bh hd kmal rshd an brsand w ahtram hqwq w azadihai bshr ra tqwit knd. amwzsh w prwrsh baid hsn tfahm, gthsht w ahtram 'qaid mkhalf w dwsti bin tmam mll w jm'ithai njadi ia mthhbi w hmtchnin gstrsh f'alithai mll mthd ra dr rah hfz slh tshil nmaid.
pdr w madr dr antkhab nw' amwzsh w prwrsh frzndan khwd nsbt bh digran awlwit darnd.
madh bist w hftm:
hr ks hq dard azadanh dr zndgi frhngi ajtma'i shrkt knd, az fnwn w hnrha bhrhmnd grdd w dr pishrft 'lmi w fwaid an shim bashd.
hr ks hq dard az hmait mnaf' m'nwi w madi athar 'lmi, frhngi ia hnri khwd brkhwrdar shwd.
madh bist w hshtm:
hr ks hq dard brqrari nzmi ra bkhwahd kh az lhaz ajtma'i w binalmlli hqwq w azadihaii ra kh drin a'lamih thkr grdidh ast ta'min knd w anha ra bh mwrd 'ml gthard.
madh bist w nhm:
hr ks dr mqabl an jam'hii wzifh dard kh rshd azad w kaml shkhsit aw ra misr sazd.

hr ks dr ajrai hqwq w astfadh az azadihai khwd fqt tab' mhdwdithaii ast kh bwsilh' qanwn mnhsran bh mnzwr ta'min shnasaii w mra'at hqwq w azadihai digran w brai r'ait mqtdiat shih akhlaqi w nzm 'mwmi w rfah hmgani dr shrait ik jam'h dmwkratik wd' grdidh ast.
in hqwq w azadiha dr hitch mwrdi nmitwand br khlaf mqasd w aswl mll mthd ajra grdd.
madh siam:

hitchik az mqrrat a'lamih hadr nbaid twri tfsir shwd kh mtdmn hqi brai dwlti ia jm'iti ia frdi bashd kh bkh mwjb an btwand hr ik az hqwq w azadihai mndrj dr in a'lamih ra az bin bbrd w ia dr an rah f'aliti bnmaid.
